Smythe,Beetle Bailey,Nancy,Dick Tracy,The Hunchback of Notre Dame,Marmaduke,The Invisible Man,Archie Andrews,Victor Frankenstein,Dagwood,Momma,Mary Worth,Blondie,Sluggo,Sonny Crockett,Frankenstein's Monster,Ricardo Tubbs,Rodan,Wicked Witch of the West,Dracula,Charlie Brown,Dennis the Menace,Creature from the Black Lagoon,James Bond,Little Orphan Annie,The Wolf Man
ComicInfo.Title: Cracked Interviews the Low-Budget Movie King; Transforming Club; A Cracked Look at 007!; Escape into Hospital; The Aliens Are Here!!; Aren't You Nervous When; Look Out for Them Household Hazards!; Telling the Truth in the New Regional-Type Magazines; The Final Episode of Comic Strips; If the Unicorn Horn Was on Other Animals; Summer Jobs for Movie Monsters; Future Uses of Video; When Theatre Owners Advertise Other Things Besides the Movie; Miami Nice
ComicInfo.Summary:
One robot tries to strike another with his own club but the club turns into a gun and shoots the robot holding it.
Hudd and Dini tunnel into a hospital and hide in a bed but the guard, disguised as a nurse, traps them.
ComicInfo.Penciller: Bill Burke,Mort Todd,John Severin,Vic Martin,Tom Short,Daniel Clowes,Éric Cartier,Walter Brogan,Tony Tallarico,John Langton,Kent Gamble,John Reiner
ComicInfo.Inker: Bill Burke,Mort Todd,John Severin,Vic Martin,Tom Short,Daniel Clowes,Éric Cartier,Walter Brogan,Tony Tallarico,John Langton,Kent Gamble,John Reiner
